Cognito security architecture um traditionally as mobile app developers you would embed your AWS access key and
secret key within the app and what would happen if if what would happen if someone reverse engineered your app was they can get access to those keys and be
able to spin up resources and you would end up with a bill and we don't do that anymore we use cognito for the purpose
of providing temporary credentials and how that actually works is architecturally um a user comes in logs
in with a public authentication provider such as Facebook or Google they authenticate themselves within their
backend and then they return either an oath or an open ID access token that token then gets passed into the Cognito
identity broker you pass in the token the pool ID that you created and the roles that you just created in the
previous screen the identity broker then returns a Cognito ID associated with that user
and it will return a set of temporary credentials which you then use to access the different uh resources on on
AWS for developer authenticated identities the flow is a little bit different so your users connect to your
backend uh authentication system and then your backend authentication decides whether this is a valid user or not if
it is a valid user your backend authentication Service needs to connect with Cognito identity and request an
open ID token so the identity broker returns a open ID token to your back end
and then your back end needs to return to the client that same token that identity broker uh responded with so as
a part of your response you need to pass that oidc token in and then the rest of
the flow is basically the same you're passing that same token pass in the pool and the roles and then you access the different um resources within
AWS so now that you have authenticated and authorized uh users within your application how do we sync local data
you use Cognito sync um Cognito sync allows you to store app data preference State you know whatever you want to stay

sets um within Amazon Cognito and user profile data is organized into data sets
